articles.author: Ella Nilsen
articles.title: Biden just unveiled America’s ambitious new climate goal. Trump will assuredly undo it - CNN
articles.description: The Biden administration just announced an aggressive target for the US to cut its planet-warming pollution over the next decade – a goal that will all but assuredly be reversed by President-elect Donald Trump in his first days in office.
